Blighted Village

Risen Road/Waukeen's Rest/Zhentarim Hideout

Buying the artist/Oskar at zhentarim hideout The Gith Patrol with Lae'zel leading, Tell Kith'rak Voss you have the Artifact

Sunlit Wetlands/Putrid Bog
